subject: Request for Request for collaboration ?
description_text:
Guys good morning, I'm Mario Cimarelli Italian streamer who loves
Simracing! I got to know your company through Instagram and I was
immediately interested in your products! If you are interested in possible
collaborations let me know. I leave you my contacts not attaching links
because sometimes it could put me in spam

Twitch Cima_89
YouTube Cima_89
Instagram Cima89

Waiting for your kind feedback, I wish you a good day and good work.

conversations.body_text: Hi Mario Cimarelli,  Alright, I’ll discuss with my team whether we can provide a sample. Could you please share which brands you’re currently working with, and how their exposure and sales performance have been?

Hi guys! I"m collaborating with TekTrama for their Flagbox!\u00A0The video
will be released soon! I decided to contact directly the clubs that most
convinced me so that I could be sincere and frank in the reviews! Because
my community believes a lot in what I do and what I say and I don"t want to
lose their trust!
你好，Mario Cimarelli，  请随时分享您的具体合作需求，我们可以讨论如何开始。

我想在你的触觉反馈出来后立即查看它！ 我在这里想到了这些！ 那样可能吗？ 我会在 Instagram 上制作一个卷轴，并在 YouTube
上制作一个专门的视频！


https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053467962

Il Sab 14 Giu 2025, 06:06 service@simsonn.com
